definitions.definition: A firearm fired from the shoulder ; improved range and accuracy is provided by a long, rifled barrel.

definitions.label_groups: military , usually in the plural , dated

definitions.definition: An artillery piece with a rifled barrel.
A strip of wood covered with emery or a similar material, used for sharpening scythes .

main_definition: ( weaponry ) A firearm fired from the shoulder ; improved range and accuracy is provided by a long, rifled barrel.
secondary_definitions: ( military , usually in the plural , dated ) A rifleman .
( weaponry ) An artillery piece with a rifled barrel.
A strip of wood covered with emery or a similar material, used for sharpening scythes .
